title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Lumen Defender Managed Rules Supercharge AWS Network Firewall (SEC102)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Lumen Defender 托管规则如何增强 AWS Network Firewall (SEC102)
abstract: In today’s threat landscape, visibility is power—and Lumen delivers it at scale. Join us to see how Lumen Defender Managed Rules, powered by Black Lotus Labs, integrates real-time threat intelligence into AWS Network Firewall. Learn how Lumen analyzes 200B+ NetFlow sessions daily to detect botnets and nation-state threats, deliver managed rules via AWS Marketplace with zero overhead, and help SOC teams reduce false positives and accelerate response. Whether you're a cloud strategist or SOC analyst, this session reveals how to turn backbone-level intelligence into your first line of defense for cloud workloads. This presentation is brought to you by Lumen, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 在当今的威胁环境中,可见性就是力量——而 Lumen 能够大规模地提供这种能力。加入我们,了解由 Black Lotus Labs 提供支持的 Lumen Defender Managed Rules 如何将实时威胁情报集成到 AWS Network Firewall 中。了解 Lumen 如何每天分析超过 2000 亿个 NetFlow 会话来检测僵尸网络和民族国家威胁,通过 AWS Marketplace 提供零开销的托管规则,并帮助 SOC 团队减少误报和加快响应速度。无论您是云战略师还是 SOC 分析师,本次会议都将揭示如何将骨干网级别的情报转化为云工作负载的第一道防线。本演示由 AWS 合作伙伴 Lumen 为您呈现。
